title: RBI Grade B - ESI - FLM 2 - Descriptive

quiz.text:
Q.1) The nature of economic growth in India in recent times is often described as jobless growth. Do you agree with this view? Give arguments in favour of your answer.


[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Moderate]

Ques.1) Has caste lost its relevance in understanding the multi-cultural Indian Society? Elaborate your answer with illustrations.


[Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Difficult]

Q.2) What are the challenges and opportunities of food processing sector in the country? How can income of the farmers be substantially increased by encouraging food processing?


[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Moderate]

Q.2) How can the 'Digital India' programme help farmers to improve farm productivity and income? What steps has the Government taken in this regard?


[Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Moderate]

Q.3) “Access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy is the sine qua non to achieve Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)”. Comment on the progress made in India in this regard.


[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Difficult]

Ques.3) Are diversity and pluralism in India under threat due to globalization? Justify your answer.


[Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Difficult]
